text: (napiye! Nam vacanankalai avarkal cevimatuppatillaiye enac cataintu) vahi mulam umakku arivikkappattavarril cilavarrai vittuvita ennavo, "avar mitu oru pokkisam irakkappata ventama? Allatu avarutan oru malakku vara ventama?" Enru avarkal kuruvatinal um itayam (cancalattal) itunkiyirukkavo kutum. Niccayamaka nir accamutti eccarippavareyanri verillai; allah ella porutkalin mitum poruppalanaka irukkiran
